survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers of subscription-based meal kit services to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and understand preferences regarding meal variety, delivery, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment respondents by their experience with the service.

script.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify brand preferences and competition.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice), with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure satisfaction with meal variety.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you subscribe to a meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand customer motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you subscribe to a meal kit service?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of ingredients received in your meal kits?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to assess ingredient quality.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of ingredients received in your meal kits?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your meal kit service?
